key_features: Designed with an LED light feature, the 90°N Visa Card lights up whenever you make a contactless payment.
Travel$ that do not expire - Convert Travel$ to loyalty points at 9 airline and hotel partner programmes.
Get cash rebates at up to 2.1% from your earned Travel$. Use it to offset credit card bills instantly.

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
air_miles: Convert to 9 airline and hotel partner programmes, including Singapore Airlines' KrisFlyer miles programme
No cap on the amount of miles you can earn
Redeem in blocks of as few as 1,000 Miles
overseas_spending: 2.1 Travel$ per S$1 of Foreign Currency spend
cash_back: Get cash rebates at up to 2.1% from your earned Travel$. Use it to offset credit card bills instantly.
entertainment: 1.3 Travel$ per S$1 for SGD spend
2.1 Travel$ per S$1 of Foreign Currency spend
grocery: 1.3 Travel$ per S$1 for SGD spend
2.1 Travel$ per S$1 of Foreign Currency spend
online_shopping: 1.3 Travel$ per S$1 for SGD spend
2.1 Travel$ per S$1 of Foreign Currency spend

eligibility: MoneySmart Exclusive Promotion is valid from 13-March-2025 to 31-March-2025
Applicable for New-to card holders only
Customers need to apply through MoneySmart to be eligible,
Charge at least 1 Qualifying Transaction to your card within 30 days of your application being approved

fees.late_payment_fee: S$100 if the minimum payment is not received by the payment due date
fees.cash_advance_fee: S$15 or 8% on the amount withdrawn, whichever is greater

minimum_income.singaporean_pr: Singaporean/PR Minimum Income S$30,000 and above for Singaporeans and Singapore PRs
minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income S$45,000 and above for foreigners
